mapper.select: SELECT M.EMAIL , M.NAME , M.PROFILE_IMG FROM ADDFRIEND F JOIN MEMBER M ON (F.APPLICANT_EMAIL = M.EMAIL) WHERE F.SUBJECT_EMAIL = #{email} AND ISAPPLY = 'Y'
SELECT M.EMAIL , M.NAME , M.PROFILE_IMG FROM ADDFRIEND F JOIN MEMBER M ON (F.SUBJECT_EMAIL = M.EMAIL) WHERE F.APPLICANT_EMAIL = #{email} AND ISAPPLY = 'Y'
